All meetings will follow [*Berkeley Time*](https://www.dailycal.org/2020/09/04/not-all-uc-berkeley-professors-use-berkeley-time-for-online-classes-students-say/).

### Office Hours

-   Thursdays, 10 AM - 11 AM via [Zoom](https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/94387793073)[^1]
-   Fridays, 11 AM - 12 AM and 4 PM - 6 PM in *Evans 434*

[^1]: You must be logged into your UC Berkeley associated Zoom account to access the meeting.
